Official: Ebon Gate Carousel Recharging

1
Evarin
Saturday, October 14th, 2017, 8:12:00 AM

Quote from GM Wyrom:

A new NPC will be wandering Caligos Isle shortly -- a tall sleek-haired incanter. He will perform the recharging of your carousels from Feywrot Mire. It will require that you have a service pass. There are no additional prices for this service.

Wyrom, PM
